results.title: Evaluation of the Effectiveness of Post-Stroke Metformin Treatment Using Permanent Middle Cerebral Artery Occlusion in Rats
results.text_hl: Growing evidence suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment also exerts neuroprotective effects against @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Damage_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001925 @@@brain damage@@@.

results.title: Metformin ameliorates brain damage caused by cardiopulmonary resuscitation via targeting endoplasmic reticulum stress-related proteins GRP78 and XBP1.

results.title: Metformin-mediated mitochondrial protection post-cardiac arrest improves EEG activity and confers neuroprotection and survival benefit.
results.text_hl: Overall, as an effective and safe drug, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has the potential to be an easily translatable intervention for improving survival and preventing @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Damage_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001925 @@@brain damage@@@ after @DISEASE_Heart_Arrest @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@CA@@@.

results.title: Acute administration of metformin prior to cardiac ischemia/reperfusion injury protects brain injury.
results.text_hl: In summary, pre-treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ offers neuroprotection against the @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Damage_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001925 @@@brain damages@@@ caused by @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@cardiac I/R injury@@@.

results.title: Brain Boron Level, DNA Content, and Myeloperoxidase Activity of Metformin-Treated Rats in Diabetes and Prostate Cancer Model.
results.text_hl: In this study, the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Boron @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001895 @@@boron@@@ levels and oxidative @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Damage_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001925 @@@brain damage@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ due to @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@ was investigated for the first time.

results.title: Metformin prevents brain injury after cardiopulmonary resuscitation by inhibiting the endoplasmic reticulum stress response and activating AMPK-mediated autophagy.
results.text_hl: This effect is closely related to the activation of @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@-induced autophagy and inhibition of the ER stress response. Long-term use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can reduce @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Damage_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001925 @@@brain damage@@@ following @DISEASE_Heart_Arrest @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@CA@@@/CPR.

results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is an activator of @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMP-activated protein kinase@@@ (@GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@).

results.title: Metformin protects the brain against ischemia/reperfusion injury through PI3K/Akt1/JNK3 signaling pathways in rats.
results.text_hl: ...Although @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, a first-line antidiabetic drug, can ameliorate @DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@/reperfusion (I/R) induced @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Damage_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001925 @@@brain damage@@@, but how @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ benefits injured hippocampus and the mechanisms are still largely unknown.

citations.NLM: Ge XH, Zhu GJ, Geng DQ, Zhang HZ, He JM, Guo AZ, Ma LL, Yu DH. Metformin protects the brain against ischemia/reperfusion injury through PI3K/Akt1/JNK3 signaling pathways in rats. Physiol Behav. 2017 Mar 1;170():115-123. PMID: 28017679
